body:
Using libxslt and & libxml2 was causing the following error:
``
xsltutils.c: In function ‘xsltSaveResultToString’:
xsltutils.c:1758:26: error: dereferencing pointer to incomplete type ‘xmlBuf {aka struct _xmlBuf’}
``
Meme documentation recommends using their built in version instead if this happens. 
http://meme-suite.org/doc/install.html?man_type=web#prereq_libxml

Also added perl-xml-parser which when missing caused an error at runtime, and image-magick, which is optionally used by meme for image output.

This build now passes our internal test.
title: meme: fix errors
